channel.title: Need the finishing touches
channel.description: nearing my sever(based from c-workz) completion, : D can you guys help me just with a few more things and then ill try not to ask any more questions for awhile, learn myself 1.)Can someone give me thier Ice n blood barrage Info..idk what to call it 2.)Simple question but i dont know- where do i edit the rewards from thieve stalls, guess cases aint them =\ 3.)Can you explain how Rangex Rangex Rangey rangey works, erm like what does it do with the coords, make a box? 4.)can any1 give me coords by any chance to a small island? 5.)Can any1 give me the interface for the character select umm menu? i guess 6.)when i used to edit your starting equipteds, save compile run, it didnt have an effect, NOW i forgot where to even try 7.)Where players log in? npchandler? >.< 8.)still never succesfully added a shop, probly just me tho 9.)thats it, and btw you guys are getting credit when i release(if i even)
